m:argument.label: Welcome to the BoilerPlate test project. In this testproject we address as much test scenarios as possible.
This enables widget builders to test their created custom widgets with the basic scenarios a widget should comply with.
Not every scenario is probably applicable to your custom widget. You can remove the scenarios from this project when they are not relevant.
Do you think we missed a scenario? Please add an issue to the issue tracker of the WidgetBoilerplate repository on GitHub.
